headline: GE Vernova, Adobe, Uber: Top Trending Stocks
summary: Energy producer GE Vernova (GEV) detailed its 2028 target, which includes plans to achieve $45 billion in revenue. Catch Yahoo Finance's full interview with GE Vernova CEO Scott Strazik where he speaks about the General Electric spinoff's expansion goals. Adobe (ADBE) shares fall further Thursday morning despite beating its fiscal fourth quarter earnings estimates. Wall Street investors were most disappointed in the software giant's full-year earnings guidance TD Cowen turns bullish on Uber (UBER) following a meeting with Uber CFO Prashanth Mahendra-Rajah. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Morning Brief here. This post was written by Luke Carberry Mogan.

headline: GE Vernova price target raised to $367 from $356 at JPMorgan
summary: JPMorgan analyst Mark Strouse raised the firm’s price target on GE Vernova (GEV) to $367 from $356 and keeps an Overweight rating on the shares following the investor event. The company’s fiscal 2025 guidance was slightly below consensus expectations, driven by the Wind segment, and it increased long-term targets originally issued at the March analyst day, also slightly below consensus expectations, the analyst tells investors in a research note. headline: GE Vernova: Valued Like The Magnificent 7, Delivering Like An Industrial
